name: Zero the Hero
description:
Zero the Hero (work in progress) by André N. Darcie

You are a hero called Zero, in a tiny open world in the Binary kingdom, full of adventures and free exploration, on a journey to find the sword One, to finally understand the meaning of life.

0 -> 1

Controls
  • Walk - W, A, S, D or Arrow Keys
  • Hit with sword - X or Left Click Mouse Button
  • Place bombs or shoot arrows - Z or Right Click Mouse Button
  • Interact with things -  Enter Key
Amazing things
  • Tiny open world - You are completely free to explore and go anywhere you want without limitations
  • All kinds of characters - Meet amazing, captivating, pessimistic and strange people
  • Interconnected systems - Set it on fire and watch an entire forest be destroyed
  • Shoulders of giants - Game is inspired by classics like The Legend of Zelda (1986)
Are you ready for this adventure?
